item.title: Conditional Render in React
item.description: In react, sometimes we need to render a component based on some flag, for example, we need to display a different set of information to the admin users than the normal users. We have a prop called isAdmin render () { const { isAdmin } = this.props return ( <div> { isAdmin ? <CustomeComponent {...propSetA} / > : <CustomeComponent {...propSetB} / > } </div> ) } Looks good right, but there is one problem.
